data.comment: Today's referee, Luca J. Pairetto, has blown to start the match.
Can Parma capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 2, Bruno Alves (Parma) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Luca J. Pairetto awards Atalanta a goal kick.
Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Parma.
In the minute 3, Atalanta attack but Remo Freuler's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Parma at Ennio Tardini.
Atalanta are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 5, At Ennio Tardini, Parma are penalized for being offside.
Luca J. Pairetto signals a free kick to Parma.
Bosko Sutalo (Atalanta) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 7, Throw-in Parma.
Riccardo Gagliolo for Parma drives towards goal at Ennio Tardini. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Atalanta needs to be cautious. Parma have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Parma close to the penalty box.
Luca J. Pairetto signals a free kick to Parma in their own half.
Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in high up the field for Atalanta in Parma.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Parma at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 13, Atalanta to take a throw-in in Parma territory.
Parma awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dejan Kulusevski hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Parma!
In the minute 15, Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Parma, Gianluca Caprari of Parma is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 17, Parma have been awarded a corner by Luca J. Pairetto.
Luca J. Pairetto awards the away team a throw-in.
Parma's Juraj Kucka misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a Atalanta goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Atalanta!
Matteo Darmian (Parma) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 20, Important block from the Parma defence as Papu Gomez fires in a strike for Atalanta.
Throw-in for Atalanta in their own half.
Free kick for Atalanta in the half of Parma.
In the minute 21, Can Atalanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Parma's half?
Luca J. Pairetto signals a Atalanta throw-in in Parma's half.
Parma pushes forward through Gianluca Caprari, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Parma in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Parma.
Robin Gosens (Atalanta) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 26, Parma have a goal kick.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Parma a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 30, Goal kick for Parma at Ennio Tardini.
Parma have a dangerous throw-in.
Luca J. Pairetto signals a free kick to Parma in their own half.
In the minute 35, Can Parma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
Attention is being given to Atalantaâ€™s Jose Luis Palomino and play has been suspended briefly.
The away team has substituted Jose Luis Palomino with Hans Hateboer. Gian Piero Gasperini is thus making his first change.
In the minute 37, Throw-in Atalanta.
Parma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Parma at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 40, Atalanta drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Goal! Parma have got their heads in front thanks to a Dejan Kulusevski strike.
Gervinho with an assist there.
In the minute 45, Robin Gosens for Atalanta gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Luca J. Pairetto awards Parma a goal kick.
Ball safe as Parma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Luca J. Pairetto will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Luca J. Pairetto signals a free kick to Parma in their own half.
Parma are caught offside.
In the minute 45, Free kick Atalanta.
Free kick for Parma in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Juraj Kucka is booked for the home team.
The second-half is underway in Parma.
Berat Djimsiti is replacing Bosko Sutalo for Atalanta at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Mario Pasalic with Ruslan Malinovskyi. This is the third substitution made today by Gian Piero Gasperini.
Parma have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Parma.
In the minute 48, Luca J. Pairetto signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Free kick for Parma in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma goal kick.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Atalanta in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Parma.
Luca J. Pairetto signals a throw-in for Atalanta, close to Parma's area.
In the minute 53, Free kick Atalanta.
Atalanta push forward at Ennio Tardini and Ruslan Malinovskyi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Parma defence.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
In the minute 56, Parma advance rapidly upfield but Luca J. Pairetto blows for offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Atalanta in Parma.
Parma awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, Parma awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Luca J. Pairetto.
Ruslan Malinovskyi for Atalanta is whistled offside.
Luca J. Pairetto signals a free kick to Atalanta.
In the minute 61, Luis Muriel is on a sub for Mattia Caldara for Atalanta.
Luca J. Pairetto signals a throw-in for Atalanta, close to Parma's area.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Parma in their own half.
In Parma Atalanta attack through Luis Muriel. The finish is off target, however.
Luca J. Pairetto awards Parma a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Parma needs to be cautious. Atalanta have an attacking throw-in.
Luca J. Pairetto awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 65, Atalanta to take a throw-in in Parma territory.
Duvan Zapata of Atalanta gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Parma at Ennio Tardini.
Ball safe as Parma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 67, Roberto D'Aversa is making the team's first substitution at Ennio Tardini with Yann Karamoh replacing Gervinho.
Parma's Riccardo Gagliolo breaks free at Ennio Tardini. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 68, Atalanta have a goal kick.
Atalanta's Luis Muriel gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma goal kick.
In the minute 69, Parma will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Atalanta.
Goal! Ruslan Malinovskyi levels the match at 1-1.
Free kick for Parma in the half of Atalanta.
In the minute 73, Luca J. Pairetto signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Throw-in for Parma at Ennio Tardini.
In Parma a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Parma.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Parma have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 77, Luca J. Pairetto signals a Atalanta throw-in in Parma's half.
Throw-in Parma.
Can Parma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
In the minute 78, Luca J. Pairetto waits before resuming play because Gianluca Caprari for Parma is still down.
Roberto D'Aversa (Parma) has taken off Gianluca Caprari who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Luca Siligardi is the replacement.
In Parma a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Parma.
Can Atalanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma's half?
Free kick for Atalanta in the half of Parma.
In the minute 83, Luca J. Pairetto awards the away team a throw-in.
Roberto D'Aversa (Parma) is making a third substitution, with Giuseppe Pezzella replacing Riccardo Gagliolo.
Parma make their fourth substitution with Simone Iacoponi replacing Antonino Barilla.
In the minute 84, Papu Gomez is on target to give Atalanta a 1-2 advantage.
Luca J. Pairetto signals a free kick to Parma.
Gian Piero Gasperini (Atalanta) is making a fifth substitution, with Adrien Tameze replacing Papu Gomez.
In the minute 86, Atalanta's Luis Muriel gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Parma defender.
Can Parma capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atalanta's half?
In Parma, Jasmin Kurtic of Parma is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 87, Luca J. Pairetto signals a Parma throw-in in Atalanta's half.
Parma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Duvan Zapata gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atalanta.
Free kick Parma.
Corner awarded to Parma.
Important block from the Atalanta defence as Luca Siligardi fires in a strike for Parma.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Parma.
Throw-in for Parma close to the penalty box.
Parma's Jasmin Kurtic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Atalanta defender.
Kastriot Dermaku (Parma) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Parma drive upfield and Jasmin Kurtic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atalanta defender.
In Parma a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma goal kick.
Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Parma Atalanta attack through Ruslan Malinovskyi. The finish is off target, however.
Luca J. Pairetto awards Parma a goal kick.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Luca J. Pairetto.
The match has come to a close in Parma. The final score is 1-2.
